items.summary: Manually verify that the user-uploaded image files referenced by the UI exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. If they are missing, locate the same image files in the repository root upload directory and move/copy them into `frontend/public/assets/generated/` so they are served publicly at the exact URLs used by the site.

Update all frontend image `src` references (including any React component `` usages) so they point directly to the correct public paths for the moved images under `/assets/generated/...`, and ensure no remaining references point to missing files.
Create and deploy Draft Version 6 after the asset placement and `src` updates are verified, and update `frontend/public/draft-version.txt` to indicate Version 6.
